name: Leilani's Island
description:
Leilani has got to roll, jump, and smash things to take back her island from mechanical invasion! A tropical 2D platformer in the making for PC.

The game has a big focus on interactivity - kick enemies into each other, roll into them to start a chain reaction, or jump off them to get higher. Roll to go faster, roll along tightropes, roll through tubes! Use all of Leilani's abilities to power through levels, collect everything, and maybe even find some secret exits...

Featuring music by Leila 'Woofle' Wilson!
